timeline.bodyText: Remove text after "ok" or " violation" in this and other lines. On exact code there is no "if".
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
Please remove class definition, the less  unnecessary code in example the better.
Your code is not compilable, so extra code does no good.
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: Do you know why this is ok ? If this is big it it is better to not put it in example.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,6 +62,23 @@ * 
  * <module name="WhitespaceAfter"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * public class MyTest {
+ *  public static void myTest() {
+ *      if (foo) {              // OK
+ *              //...
+ *      } else if(bar) {        // violation
+ *              //...
+ *      }
+ *
+ *      testMethod(foo, bar);   // OK
+ *      testMethod(foo,bar);    // violation
+ *
+ *      for(;;){}               // OK

replies.bodyText:
This is the intended behavior:

Checks that a token is followed by whitespace, with the exception that it does not check for whitespace after the semicolon of an empty for iterator. Use Check EmptyForIteratorPad to validate empty for iterators.

So, I thought it best to show that.
replies.author: nmancus1
